name: Snake Fire Worm Bot
description:
Snake Fire Worm Bot is a fun snake game which allow you to crawl with your slither worm.
This is an adventure slither worm games, where you play as a worm who is growing while crawling and eating light dots or defeating other snakes.
Features:
- Slide the mobile snake game
- free to all players
- Many worms can choose
- classic snake
- Intuitive screen operation
- There are strategic crawl routes
- become the largest worm
